Roman (; ) is a rural locality (a selo), and one of two settlements in Sen-Kyuyolsky Rural Okrug of Srednekolymsky District in the Sakha Republic, Russia, in addition to Oyusardakh, the administrative center of the Rural Okrug. It is located  from Srednekolymsk, the administrative center of the district and  from Oyusardakh. Its population as of the 2010 Census was 0; the same as recorded during the 2002 Census.
